author: prussell
msg: Adding example of FragmentExtractor usage. I'll try and make this a little
more impressive sometime soon, but I wanted to get something up there so
that people can see how to use it. I'll send an e-mail announcing this
tomorrow morning, when I have some energy!

author: prussell
msg: Temporarily disabled session logicsheet as it seems the sheet itself isn't
in the repository. Also made a few formatting changes - tabs to spaces etc.

author: prussell
msg: Initial stab at what I'm provisionally calling a FragmentExtractor.
This enables sitemap managers to extract initially SVG images (and
very soon now, any element) from a SAX stream, and then re-serialize
them into another pipeline. It needs a fair bit of work, but it's
working well. I would like long term to have this thing triggered on
an XPath, but until we have an event driven XPath API, that's going
to be too slow for my liking (it would mean DOMing the entire stream,
which is not something I want to be doing at the moment). I will
commit some examples of usage sometime this evening.

author: prussell
msg: Brought AbstractGenerator.setup(...)'s throws clause into line with
SitemapModelComponent, and modified existing generators where required.
